<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magnetic Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1979)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Copper rings spiral around this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19). Twin electrical probes near the grip can socket into a jar of moderate (or higher leveled) [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3290), which takes 3 Interact actions to install.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** A bottled lightning is installed in the shield; **Effect** The shield becomes an electromagnet for 3 rounds. When an activated magnetic shield is raised, the circumstance bonus increases by 1 against attacks made with weapons primarily made of metal. If you use a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212) against a creature attacking you with such a weapon, you also gain a +1 item bonus to Disarm attempts against that weapon until the end of your next turn. The activation uses up the bottled lightning, and the shield can’t be activated again until a new one is installed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Magnetic Shield
